author: Special Correspondent
text:
KG Hospital will conduct a free screening for detection of diabetes and kidney disease on March 10.

The objective is to create an awareness among the general public about prevention, early diagnosis, and treatment. Blood test, ultra sonography and treatments will be provided free of cost for the needy.

For details contact 9865221255, email:cbckghmgr@gmail.com
title: Free medical check-up
